question: We named our new born "Hadi" which i was told is a title of our Prophet (SAW).But i recently learnt that this is also one of the 99 names of Allah .Is permissible to have a name "Hadi" ?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Yes, it is permissible. (Aalamgiri vol.5 pg.364)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
